name: European PVC Window Profiles and related Building Products Association
goal: EPPA is the trade association of European PVC-U window system companies, related national associations and component manufacturers. Based in Brussels, EPPA represents the interests of its members at European level vis-Ã -vis the general public and administrative authorities. As a platform for the bundling of national activities and achievements, EPPA invites experts to continuously drive forward the state of the art in PVC-U window systems technology. Related building products refer to all rigid PVC and cellular profiles used for finishing windows, home protection as well as internal and external decoration.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Taxation, Trade
